channel.title: money hole – Angry Bear
channel.description: Slightly left of center economic commentary on news, politics and the economy.

item.title: The National Money Hole, should it go?
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: This is a very important issue that should be discussed at all econ blogs. It has far reaching ramifications and frankly, I want to know why we did not hear more about the closing of the National Money Hole from president elect Obama. Nor was there one word coming from the Republican Governors Association meeting. […]
item.content:encoded:
This is a very important issue that should be discussed at all econ blogs. It has far reaching ramifications and frankly, I want to know why we did not hear more about the closing of the National Money Hole from president elect Obama. Nor was there one word coming from the Republican Governors Association meeting.

In The Know: Should The Government Stop Dumping Money Into A Giant Hole?

I think the last commentator is correct: If you love America, you throw money in its hole.
